author: Isabel Dayman
title: Greens and SA Best MPs enter self-isolation but vote on bills via text
description: Four South Australian Upper House MPs in self-quarantine because of coronavirus concerns resort to what one described as "highly unusual" methods to stay in touch with Parliament.
content:
Posted March 25, 2020 19:35:29 Four South Australian Upper House MPs have entered self-imposed quarantine as a precaution because of coronavirus concerns. Key points:
  • Two SA Best and two Greens MPs are working from home
  • Greens MP Mark Par… [+2628 chars]
